cicd.description: I'm passionate about the DevOps culture: doing difficult work in an automated way.
tooltip: Baiscally, it means that the code that a programmer made, goes through a list of automatic tests before being able to take his changes to the code used by customers (production) in the product.
Basically, it refers to bringing new changes automatically to production (commonly to the server) so that clients can consume them..
- Your code is tested so that it does not affect the product.
- Your changes are integrated into production.
